trans-unit.source: Provides common designer loader functionality that can be used to implement custom workflow designer loaders.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade de carregador de designer comum que pode ser usada para implementar carregadores de designer de fluxo de trabalho personalizado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Designer loader classes are used to load the designer and save any changes to the state of the designer when the user so instructs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O carregador de designer classes é usado para carregar o designer e salvar as alterações para o estado do designer, quando então instrui o usuário.

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowDesignerLoader class can be implemented to support custom loading of a workflow designer and workflow designer components.
trans-unit.target: A classe WorkflowDesignerLoader pode ser implementada para dar suporte a carregamento personalizado de um designer de fluxo de trabalho e componentes do designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A workflow designer loader is also responsible for writing changes to an open document back to the storage the loader used when loading the document after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Um carregador de designer de fluxo de trabalho também é responsável por gravar alterações para um documento aberto para o armazenamento o carregador usado ao carregar o documento após o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds an activity to the designer host after it has been added to the parent activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma atividade para o host de designer depois que ele foi adicionado à coleção de atividades pai.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>Para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dispose releases all services used by the designer host, but it does not write pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Dispose libera todos os serviços usados pelo host de designer, mas não gravará as alterações pendentes para o carregador do designer.

trans-unit.source: If you want to save any pending changes prior to releasing all resources, call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before you call Dispose.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja salvar as alterações pendentes antes de liberar todos os recursos, chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>antes de chamar Dispose.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the file name of the designer to load.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o nome do arquivo do designer para carregar.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the file name of the designer to load.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do arquivo do designer para carregar.

trans-unit.source: Writes pending changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Grava as alterações pendentes para o local onde o designer foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, causes <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> to reload the designer.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, faz com que <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> para recarregar o designer.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves an object that <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> uses to read from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, recupera um objeto que <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> usa para ler do arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a path to the file to read from.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém um caminho para o arquivo para leitura do.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextReader> to read the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.TextReader>para ler o arquivo especificado.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an object that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> uses to write to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém um objeto que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> usa para gravar o arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and return a `TextWriter` object when the GetFileWriter overloaded method is called.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e retornar um `TextWriter` objeto quando o GetFileWriter sobrecarregado método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[WF_Samples#34](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets.cs#34)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#34](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets.vb#34)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[WF_Samples"](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets.cs#34)][!code-vb[WF_Samples" ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets.vb#34)]

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the file to write to.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho para o arquivo para gravação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>para gravar o arquivo.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow should be loaded in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o fluxo de trabalho deve ser carregado no modo de depuração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow should be loaded in debug mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o fluxo de trabalho deve ser carregado no modo de depuração; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> with any services required by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> com todos os serviços necessários pelo host do carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: Applies the serialized layout to the root designer in the current designer host.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se o layout serializado para o designer raiz no host do designer atual.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that is created for the serialized layout.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que é criado para o layout serializado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: List of errors that occurred during the deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Lista de erros que ocorreram durante a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified resource and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*> method that applies the serialized layout to the root designer in the current designer host.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o recurso especificado e chama o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>método que aplica o layout serializado para o designer raiz no host do designer atual.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type> that the resource is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>Se o recurso está associado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Nome do recurso.

trans-unit.source: Errors encountered during the call to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>.
trans-unit.target: Erros encontrados durante a chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>

trans-unit.source: Called when loading of the designer is completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o carregamento do designer é concluído.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if load operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a operação de carregamento for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the load errors.
trans-unit.target: Contém os erros de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: Writes cached changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Gravações em cache as alterações para o local que o designer foi carregado por.

trans-unit.source: Class that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> interface, which manages design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: Classe que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> interface, que gerencia a serialização de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Loads the designer from a design document.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o designer de um documento de design.

trans-unit.source: Class that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> interface, which manages design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: Classe que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> interface, que gerencia a serialização de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Removes an activity from the designer host after it has been added to the parent activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove uma atividade do host de designer depois que ele foi adicionado à coleção de atividades pai.

trans-unit.source: Activity to be removed from the designer.
trans-unit.target: Atividade a ser removido do designer.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the designer layout.
trans-unit.target: Serializa o layout do designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> that is used to serialize the layout into.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref>que é usado para serializar o layout em.

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which you get the layout information.
trans-unit.target: Atividade de raiz de onde obter as informações de layout.

trans-unit.source: Errors encountered during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Erros encontrados durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> metadata of the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> metadados do destino [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> metadata of the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> metadados do destino [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
